channel.title: [PI] HighScores Problem?
channel.description:
Well I followed the tutorial on here for Highscore on PI perfectly yet I end up with a problem.
On my highscores page I get the following error on all the skills,
[code]Notice: Undefined variable: output in C:\xampp\htdocs\highscores\functions.php on line 9
Notice: Undefined variable: points in C:\xampp\htdocs\highscores\functions.php on line 10[/code]
And on the overall page I get this,
[code]Notice: Undefined index: playerName in C:\xampp\htdocs\highscores\highscores.php on line 238
Notice: Undefined index: name in C:\xampp\htdocs\highscores\highscores.php on line 239
Notice: Undefined index: type in C:\xampp\htdocs\highscores\highscores.php on line 240
Notice: Undefined index: type in C:\xampp\htdocs\highscores\highscores.php on line 240
Notice: Undefined index: type in C:\xampp\htdocs\highscores\highscores.php on line 243[/code]
Can anyone help please?

item.title: [PI] HighScores Problem?
item.dc:creator: @jSherz jSherz
item.description:
@jSherz wrote:

Do the highscores work correctly? If they do, it’s likely that they were poorly coded in the tutorial and therefore use variables that haven’t been defined yet.

If they don’t work, can you check that you followed the tutorial exactly?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] HighScores Problem?
